lines.text: In days of old / When knights were bold / And romance had its fling. / All hail the royal bride and groom. / Long live the king!
She acts like a fanatic! Lock her in the attic!
I am a wandering minstrel. / I journey from afar. / My worldly goods are a sleepy old mule, / A song and a busted guitar. / Ha ha!

[written on a partly unrolled scroll, which obscures the last line]
Ye Caste / Ye Wandering Minstrel~ MICKEY MOUSE / Ye Princess~~~~~ MINNIE MOUSE / Ye Prince~~~~~ DIPPY DAWG / Ye Olde King~~~
On my command, you'll give thy hand and wedlock to yon prince.

[guffaws]
I know you'll learn to love me.
